nodes.text: The FastTurn-3 Hydrospanner was a model of hydrospanner that was manufactured by Regallis Engineering.

The FastTurn-3 had an internal power source and included a tension adjuster and a hinge on the socket driver to allow the user to access bolts and other fasteners placed in confined angles and spaces. The FastTurn-3 also had a spare bit compartment in the handle and a data port to which a diagnostic device or datapad could be connected. The FastTurn-3 could also fit different sized nuts ranging from 2mm to 250mm in diameter, while using a small fusioncutter to remove molecular adhesives or welds before loosening.
